mapper.select: select id as id, order_no as orderNo, shop_shipping_no as shopShippingNo, `type` as type, company_code as companyCode, company as company, `number` as number, shipping_money as shippingMoney, receiver as receiver, receiver_headimg as receiverHeadimg, receiver_phone as receiverPhone, receiver_address as receiverAddress, created_time as createdTime, updated_time as updatedTime, status as status from mall_shop_shipping where order_no=#{orderNo}
